amendment.description: An amendment prohibit the use of funds by the Census Bureau for enforcement of a criminal penalty imposed upon those individuals who choose not to complete the American Community Survey.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to enforce section 221(a) of title 13, United States Code, with respect to the American Community Survey.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Poe (TX).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
